fields.headline: The week's highlights
fields.bodyText: Secretary Take a letter Ms Gyllenhaal... Uptight lawyer James Spader expects his office demands to be taken very seriously in this witty S&M spin on working relationships. · Thursday, 10pm, C4 Planet Earth Yes, all good things come to an end - but what an ending... Pods of dolphins devouring shoals of mackerel, whale sharks stalking the deep and creatures like the vampire squid, freakier than any of Godzilla's enemies. · Sunday, 9pm, BBC1 Extinct For once, a good reason to put celebs in a jungle... Sadie Frost, David Suchet, Anneka Rice, Michael Portillo and Miranda Richardson help out some endangered species. · Saturday, 7.30pm, ITV1 Bodies Can Max Beesley finally clean up Patrick Baladi's mess? A great feature-length finale wraps up this bloody, engrossing hospital drama. · Wednesday, 10pm, BBC3 The Beat My Heart Skipped Expertly-judged drama that teases out the redemptive power of music, as low-life property thug Romain Duris wrestles with squatters, baseball bats and Bach. · Wednesday, 8pm, Sky Cinema 1
